Big Data Analytics
Harnessing our Big Data Experience to Create Seamless Customer Experience
Get A Free Quote

Big Data Analytics Company

As a trusted big data analytics services provider in India, iNEXTURE offers high-end and top-ranked services to help businesses boost their big data projects. Our team of architects, engineers and data scientists have successfully delivered secure, scalable and robust solutions to the clients across diverse industry verticals.
We analyze big data and provide you the deepest insights into undiscovered possibilities. Our data scientists have a unique approach to critically analyze each piece of information before taking a business decision. Major use-cases for big data analytics include risk modeling, advertisement targeting, understand consumer behavior, fraud analysis, and log analysis.

Our Proposition

  • Industry-leading experience in Big Data Consulting
  • Solution-Driven Approach
  • Implementation Experience
  • Greater flexibility & Reduced Risk
  • Data Management and Retrieval
  • Customer Centric Engagement Model

Why Clients Choose iNEXTURE for Big Data Consulting?

iNEXTURE team has expertise in defining business intelligence through big data analysis using Hadoop, Hbase, Hive, Pig, Ozee, Scoop, Thrift, Solr, and Impala. We use Pantaho analytics to manage analysis results and prepare reports.
Our domain expertise, business acumen coupled with profound technical skills allows us to devise a Big Data strategy that aligns with your overall business goals and integrate Big Data into your IT roadmap to empower your business.

Big Data

  • Hadoop
  • Apache Hive
  • Thrift Services
  • Mahout Services
